Text: My standalone divX-dvd player refuses to play this file, says "Codec not supported". I'll run it throug dr. DivX for a few hours.
VLC plays it well, try that.
These movie is in  MP4 format if you wondering. It wont work in your dvd player unless it has MP4

Great Movie
